statements: SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_compounds;
SELECT compound_name, efficacy_score FROM pharmaceutical_compounds ORDER BY efficacy_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_compounds WHERE study_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT compound_name, compound_formula FROM pharmaceutical_compounds WHERE efficacy_score > 0.8;
SELECT compound_id, compound_name, study_date FROM pharmaceutical_compounds ORDER BY study_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_compounds WHERE compound_id = 1;
SELECT compound_name, efficacy_score FROM pharmaceutical_compounds WHERE study_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY efficacy_score DESC;
SELECT compound_name, compound_formula FROM pharmaceutical_compounds WHERE efficacy_score > 0.8 AND study_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT compound_id, compound_name, study_date FROM pharmaceutical_compounds ORDER BY study_date ASC, compound_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(efficacy_score) AS average_score, COUNT(*) AS total_compounds FROM pharmaceutical_compounds;
SELECT * FROM compounds;
SELECT compound_id, compound_name FROM compounds WHERE testing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT study_name, effectiveness_score FROM research_studies WHERE effectiveness_score >= 8.0;
SELECT compound_name, molecular_formula FROM compounds ORDER BY compound_name DESC;
SELECT study_name, effectiveness_score FROM research_studies WHERE compound_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM compounds WHERE compound_id = 10;
SELECT compound_name, testing_date FROM compounds WHERE molecular_formula='C6H12O6';
SELECT study_id, study_name, effectiveness_score FROM research_studies WHERE effectiveness_score > 0.8 ORDER BY study_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_studies JOIN compounds ON research_studies.compound_id = compounds.compound_id WHERE study_name LIKE '%research%';
SELECT compound_name, molecular_formula FROM compounds WHERE testing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM compounds;
SELECT compound_id, compound_name FROM compounds ORDER BY compound_name DESC;
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date FROM studies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT compound_id, study_id, efficacy FROM results WHERE efficacy > 0.8 ORDER BY efficacy DESC;
SELECT compound_name, tested_on FROM compounds WHERE tested_on BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM compounds;
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date FROM studies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT compound_id, compound_name FROM compounds ORDER BY compound_id DESC;
SELECT study_name, end_date FROM studies WHERE study_name LIKE '%experiment%' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT compound_name, efficacy FROM compounds INNER JOIN results ON compounds.compound_id = results.compound_id WHERE efficacy > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM compounds;
SELECT compound_name, molecular_weight FROM compounds WHERE molecular_weight > 100;
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date FROM studies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT center_name, location FROM research_centers ORDER BY center_name DESC;
SELECT compound_name, efficacy_score FROM compounds, test_results WHERE compounds.compound_id = test_results.compound_id AND efficacy_score BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0;
SELECT compound_id, compound_name FROM compounds ORDER BY compound_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM studies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT center_name, location FROM research_centers WHERE director_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT study_name, study_description FROM studies WHERE study_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT c.compound_name, tr.efficacy_score FROM compounds c INNER JOIN test_results tr ON c.compound_id = tr.compound_id WHERE tr.efficacy_score > 8 ORDER BY tr.efficacy_score DESC
SELECT * FROM Compound;
SELECT CompoundName, Formula FROM Compound ORDER BY CompID DESC;
SELECT StudyName, StartDate, EndDate FROM Study WHERE LeadScientist = 'John Smith';
SELECT SubjectName, Gender FROM TestSubject ORDER BY DOB ASC;
SELECT TechName, Specialty, HireDate FROM LabTechnician WHERE HireDate >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Compound;
SELECT CompID, CompoundName, Supplier FROM Compound WHERE CompID = 1;
SELECT StudyName, StartDate, EndDate FROM Study WHERE StudyID = 3 ORDER BY StartDate DESC;
SELECT SubjectName, Gender, Weight FROM TestSubject WHERE Gender = 'F' AND Weight > 50;
SELECT TR.Result, C.CompoundName, S.SubjectName FROM TestResults TR JOIN Compound C ON TR.CompID = C.CompID JOIN TestSubject S ON TR.SubjectID = S.SubjectID WHERE TR.Result > 100;
